posts.post_content:
Goode and/or Bliss

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/63796/goode-fact-649[/IMG]

Wilbur presents well in SGC 50 holder in the somewhat more difficult Sweet Cap Factory 649 reverse.  Asking $66 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/24762/bliss[/IMG]

Happy Jack is a bargain at $55 shipped

Take the remaining two for only 109 shipped

All pricing is net to me.  Let's get 'er done.  Combined price Friday only.

Red Chance and his half-ass $OLD

*Edit: sold, but not to me.
Current price for both is $109.  Was going to offer a trade for Jeff’s Hindu, but at $110 we are too far apart.:D
